definition: expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Be affirmative with unerring intuition for his booming business tactics.
